Package com.nalvared.ntag21xseries

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NTagEventListener
    NTag21x This interface provide two method for interacting with the NTag21x Néstor Álvarez Díaz, contact[at]nalvared.com
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NTag213
    NTag213 extends NTag21x This class defines the main pages for NTag213 specific model Néstor Álvarez Díaz, contact[at]nalvared.com
    NTag215
    NTag215 extends NTag21x This class defines the main pages for NTag215 specific model Néstor Álvarez Díaz, contact[at]nalvared.com
    NTag216
    NTag216 extends NTag21x This class defines the main pages for NTag216 specific model Néstor Álvarez Díaz, contact[at]nalvared.com
    NTag21x
    NTag21x This class implements the main methods for interacting with NFC NTag213, NTag215 and NTag216 models The difference with other libraries is that it allows used the authentication properties of the these tags Note that android.nfc.tech.NfcA is used to interact with the tags Specification document available in: https://www.nxp.com/docs/en/data-sheet/NTAG213_215_216.pdf Néstor Álvarez Díaz, contact[at]nalvared.com
